item.title: Hidden Markov Model
item.description: The hidden Markov model, HMM, is a type of [[State Space Models]] State Space Models The state space model is an important category of models for sequential data such as time series 1. HMM Bishop2006 Christpher M. Bishop. Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning. Springer-Verlag New York; 2006.  ↩︎
